info.description: API for SellerProof video management platform
info.title: SellerProof API

get.description: Retrieve audit logs with optional filtering by user_id, org_id, action_type, result, and date range

post.description: Initiate password reset process by sending a code to email
Authenticate user with email and password
Logout user and invalidate refresh token

get.description: Get list of organizations the user belongs to

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token
Register a new user with email, password, full name and optional organization name
Switch active organization for the current user and rotate tokens
Verify user email with verification code sent to email

delete.description: Delete organization and all related data (owner only)

get.description: List all invitations for organization (admin/manager only)

post.description: Accept invitation to organization using invite code
Invite user to organization with specific role (admin/manager only)

get.description: List all members of organization (admin only)

put.description: Update the name of an organization (admin only)

get.description: Get video information by video ID
Get temporary presigned URL for private video download (1 hour)
Get public video by public token

post.description: Publish video to public bucket (admin/manager only)
Move video from public bucket back to private (admin/manager only)

get.description: Search videos with query and pagination

post.description: Complete multipart upload and create video record
Initiate multipart upload for video file
Get presigned URLs for multipart upload parts

delete.description: Soft-delete a video belonging to current organization

models.AcceptInvitationRequest.description: Accept invitation request with invite code

models.AcceptInvitationResponse.description: Accept invitation response with membership details and new tokens

models.AuditLog.description: Audit log entry for user actions

models.GetUserOrganizationsResponse.description: Response containing list of user organizations

models.InviteUserRequest.description: Invite user request with email and role

models.InviteUserResponse.description: Invite user response with invitation details

models.LoginRequest.description: Login request with email and password

models.LoginResponse.description: Login response with tokens and user info

models.RefreshTokenResponse.description: Refresh token response with new tokens

models.RegisterResponse.description: Registration response with user ID and message

models.UpdateProfileRequest.description: Profile update request with full name

models.VerifyEmailRequest.description: Email verification request with email and code

models.VerifyEmailResponse.description: Email verification response with success status
